## Constitution Compliance

- [ ] CHK001 Code quality: Linting and formatting passes
- [ ] CHK002 Code quality: Functions > 50 lines justified
- [ ] CHK003 Testing: All tests written before implementation (Red-Green-Refactor)
- [ ] CHK004 Testing: 80%+ code coverage achieved, 100% for financial calculations
- [ ] CHK005 UX: Design system components used consistently
- [ ] CHK006 UX: WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility validated
- [ ] CHK007 Performance: Initial load < 2s on 3G verified
- [ ] CHK008 Performance: API response times meet targets (< 500ms reads, < 1000ms writes)

- [ ] CHK009 First checklist item with clear action
